/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image presents a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street is lined with a variety of buildings, their architecture hinting at the rich history and culture of the city. Trees and streetlights punctuate the scene, adding to the urban landscape. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a vibrant backdrop to the cityscape. The sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow over the scene and highlighting the colors of the city.
